#title.title: Shifted Days
#title.content: This example shows how to shift day start times from midnight to 6PM.

.b-weekview .b-dayview-timeaxis-time-00.title: Midnight
.b-weekview .b-dayview-timeaxis-time-00.content: Midnight is just another time in the shifted day.

[data-date='2020-10-12'] .b-day-name-dat.title: Spanning Day Column
[data-date='2020-10-12'] .b-day-name-dat.content: Notice how day columns span two days.
